website_summaries.verdict: A simple electric chainsaw that can take care of most jobs around a home. Not for professional use.
pros: Plug-and-play chainsaw that is easy to handle
Great for those on a budget
cons: A few owners complain of oil leakage

customer_reviews.title: Saw-eet!
customer_reviews.text: Just put oil in it and start sawing! I used this chainsaw to cut up a large dead limb that came down from an ash tree in our front yard after some thunderstorms rolled through town. I did the job in my driveway, and this saw did great. Chain tension wasn't an issue, as I checked it after each cut, and the chain just ripped through the tree limb like a boss. No chain oil comes with this saw, but any hardware store will have it. I considered a Stihl gas chainsaw, but couldn't justify paying that much for something I won't use very often. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Oh-Gee

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited about this purchase, I was going to get my yard and trees and scrap wood cleaned up once and for all. Then 2017 turned into quite a year, which kept me from ever even starting the chainsaw or taking it out of the box. Finally, I did yesterday. Seemed like it was going to work great at first. Within 5 minutes the chain was falling off and everytime I tightened it back on (and yes it was being lubricated) it would last for only a moment. Lost my return window as well. Big bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Shouldaboughtstock

customer_reviews.title: Struggled with first small job and slipped the chain four times in 30 to 40 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: Wish that I had listened to reviews that the chain slips easily on this chainsaw. I purchased it to cut up some tree limbs that I pruned with a polesaw earlier in the week. The chainsaw struggled to get through limbs that the less powerful polesaw cut off easily. Then the chain slipped within 20 minutes of turning it on. When I reattached it, I noticed that the guard is secured by a single internal peg which makes it wobbly and prone to slipping the chain. It slipped off again a few minutes later. Then a third time, then a fourth, all within the first 30-40 minutes of opening the box. I gave up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Orr

customer_reviews.title: Definitely wouldn't recommend or buy again
customer_reviews.text: The first one didn't oil the chain at all. The second one the blade keeps jumping off the track. Unfortunately, I let the return window close on the second one as I'm busy traveling for work. I'm left with trying to figure out a way to tinker with using the motor in my greenhouse project, because I had to buy another chainsaw. Definitely wouldn't recommend or buy again. Gave it 2 stars because I was able to finish one project with the 2 chainsaws. My advice is to spend more and buy a better quality chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: papayamon

customer_reviews.title: Tension bolt broke within first week
customer_reviews.text: Tension bolt broke within first week of light use. It snapped off at the end, where it screws in underneath the guard. Chainsaw is completely inoperable. Tried to go online and can’t find any kind of customer service to request a new one. I don’t have packaging to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Yeasayer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you don't know how to put together a chain saw
customer_reviews.text: First of all the directions are terrible....showing the chain on backwards!!!!! After I figured that out, I cut one piece of wood, about 3" in diameter, and the chain fell off. Finally got the chain back on and turned tension screw (very difficult to get to) all the way clockwise and still had a huge amount of slack. I'm a critical care nurse, very persistant and can usually figure things out. However, after spending several hours on this and cutting my finger, it's going back and I'm going to Lowe's and buying a saw with THE CHAIN ALREADY ON!! PS The oil reservoir also leaks!! W (very inconven
customer_reviews.author: Liz H.

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive about purchasing this saw after I saw other reviews regarding the auto oiler not working. I decided to give it a shot anyway and I ham quite satisfied. I used this saw for cutting logs. It was used for approximately four hours on the first day and it worked perfect. I had no problems at all with the oil. It was easy to adjust the tension. The saw was very quiet and did not overheat at all. I am definitely a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Auto chain/bar oiler does not work on two in a row...going for three and will keep you posted
customer_reviews.text: I just returned my second one of these and ordered a third. I used each of the first two saws for ~45 minute jobs, post Irma, to great effect. Easily got through 12" and less trees, limbs, etc...but both times the saw consumed no oil. The chain was completely dry. I like the saw so much I may just oil the chain/bar manually if the third one's auto oiler does not work, esp. after buying a gallon of Oregon bar/chain oil.
customer_reviews.author: Trenchant One

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! cuts just as well as my 16" gas-powered saw. no more mixing, no more priming, pulling, adjusting idle speeds, hard starting, stalling in the middle of a job, etc. just plug it in and start cutting! it even had good power when powered through a 100' regular-duty extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: EngineeringTiger

customer_reviews.title: Leaked oil
customer_reviews.text: Never used just added the chain and oil and it sat on the weight bench and leaked oil. Moved it to the shelf after wiping up the oil, assuming oil was spilled when adding, and it again leaked all over shelf. Returned and was given a full refund. It was exactly what we were looking for so I am sorry it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Trying2getalong

customer_reviews.title: Great chainsaw starts right up and can handle tree size ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chainsaw starts right up and can handle tree size limbs . Chain never fell off and oil reservoir seemed to not be adding oil at first but after a few cuts it was noticeable the auto oil was working. Even my mom in her 60s gave it a try with no problem. Much more quiet then a gas saw. If you cut trees for a living buy a big expensive gas saw but for around the house this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Bricault

customer_reviews.title: I have heard that others were satisfied, so have ordered a new chain in the ...
customer_reviews.text: During the first tree pruning session, the chain came off repeatedly despite using exactly as instructed. We could not tighten it enough to keep it on the blade. I have heard that others were satisfied, so have ordered a new chain in the hopes that perhaps it was defective. I wouldn't recommend the product for big jobs or larger size branches. The peach tree that was pruned was an old but still producing tree. We could not keep the chain on the saw to cut a four inch diameter branch. Maybe it works for smailer and younger trees. I just was not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: doglover1

customer_reviews.title: nice design strong cuts like my gas chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: nice design strong cuts like my gas chainsaw, but no carburetor.... the auto oil level has sight tank, but seems to get clogged? but that happens with most saws. haven't looked for it so hope it can be cleaned. however side comes off very easy with green knob so access to clutch area is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: offshore859

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box and chainsaw bar missing Twice.
customer_reviews.text: This item could very well be a great chainsaw but no way to tell. I purchased this item once then did an exchange. Each time the box arrived damaged with no bar inside, though at least the second time it came with the plastic guard for the bar I guess. At this point i'm just doing a refund and going to Wal-mart to get one rather than waiting for another useless item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tidmore

customer_reviews.title: It broke!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice product and worked well for the first three uses. The chain adjuster broke on the fourth use and is unable to be repaired. We have tried to contact the company and they are no where to be found. It is still under warranty. This was a big disappointment and we are now buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this thing was a piece of crap. The chain kept separating and it has no power.
customer_reviews.author: peace be with you

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: when I got the saw the box was in bad shape and you could not read the shipping label, when I went to put the saw togather the bar was missing, the way the box was open and the end of box tore open I am sure the part fell out. I wont be buying this again it was to beat up from shipping and the label on the box you could not read it looked like it had been returned at a different time or had got into water.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a newbie
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My first chainsaw, works great. It took me a bit to get the bar situated and the chain pulled tight while putting the cover on. If you don't get it sorta snug it won't tighten good when you use the tension screw. Didnt have any issue with the self oiling. Ran it before using it so it would oil. Chain will become lose, even says so in the book. Just tighten the tension when the chain cools off. I bought it to slice our logs for crafting purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Stevi

customer_reviews.title: I had a lot of wind damage form the previous winter of some large lower branches and this cut through them nicely. I have also u
customer_reviews.text: First, I am a female that had never used a chainsaw. This came out of the box ready to go (had to put the oil in) and it has done everything I needed it to do. I had a lot of wind damage form the previous winter of some large lower branches and this cut through them nicely. I have also used it for the small branches. It adjusts (chain and blade) with ease and doesn't take a mechanic to figure it out. The weight has been good too, not too heavy or too light. I would definitely recommend this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS AND CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Less than hour of yard clean up and I had to replace the chain 5 times. There is no tension dial which makes it very difficult to install chain at the right tension as it does not come assembled. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ellis

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY happy with this saw! It's ready to use right out of the box (once filled with oil, of course). Tightening the chain is easy, and the chain remained on-track throughout an entire tree removal job. It's powerful, too, and had no trouble going through a hardwood trunk and turning an entire tree into firewood. No issues with overheating.
customer_reviews.author: WichacpiHoskila

customer_reviews.title: Broken and open box
customer_reviews.text: The second opened and broken box received in the last few days. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mica

customer_reviews.title: ... on the visual inspection the saw looked new and good. Well I got busy at work and just ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this saw a few weeks ago and on the visual inspection the saw looked new and good. Well I got busy at work and just left it in my closet while the return window expired. I went to use it today and the saw cuts good as you would expect but the chain oiler does not work. I guess I am stuck with it now. I remember reading a review about the oiler not working but I thought I would take a chance on it. Good saw bad oiler. Probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This has proven to be a very useful chainsaw. We've cut down 10 or so small ...
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be a very useful chainsaw. We've cut down 10 or so small trees (6" trunks) and one large one (15" trunk). The chain is starting to dull now, but we feel like this was a really good value. It's easy to maintain and store as well!
customer_reviews.author: Shana L. Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Never go back to gas!
customer_reviews.text: I removed the saw from the well packed box, added bar oil, and proceeded to cut up several 12" oak logs. This is so much easier to use and more convenient than my gas saw. And much more neighbor friendly!
customer_reviews.author: ACTech47

customer_reviews.title: LIMITED USEFULNESS
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. Okay for small jobs, but not a heavyweight for a challenging cut (dense woody tree stump). The chain frequently becomes looser from the guide rail as extended use times. Probably okay for someone who doesn’t really need a chainsaw very often. For bigger jobs, Forget it!!!
customer_reviews.author: RAZOR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several bad storms recently and lots of broken trees as a result. This may not be big and fancy but it sure did the job for us!! A woman can use it eaily!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs UP!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to purchase an electric chain saw as i have always used gas. However advancing age and arthritis of the shoulder convinced me to switch to electric. I am very pleased with the performance and price of this chainsaw. I have cut down two trees and cut up a third which the beavers dropped on my pontoon. I look forward to many seasons with this new saw and would not hesitate to recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It worked great..the first two times I used it. The chain broke on the 3rd use on minor branches
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Light weight . Well made . doesn’t have heavy duty power but it really helped ( small or light ) job done ✅. For the prices , really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bee San

customer_reviews.title: It started off working but after 25 minutes, the ...
customer_reviews.text: It started off working but after 25 minutes, the chain came off. After re-threading the chain about 4-5 times, I quit since the chain kept coming off. I am going to see if I can return it for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: A cut the trees back beside the house With this chainsaw. It works really good! My dad is older and this is easy for him to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Willard

customer_reviews.title: Impressive power and durable construction.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed how easily this chainsaw cut through the downed branches in my yard. Easy assembly, concise easy to read instructions. Very good quality, durable construction, lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: This chainsaw works as well as or better than my 16 inch gas powered craftsman chainsaw except ...
customer_reviews.text: This chainsaw works as well as or better than my 16 inch gas powered craftsman chainsaw except this one is much quieter and nearly effortless to use. It's a little heavier than I expected for an electric chainsaw but not too bad but still lighter than my gas powered. I love this chainsaw but my old lady hates it cause I nearly cut every tree down in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM SPENDING MONEY

customer_reviews.title: Not to heavy and works pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Not to heavy and works pretty darn good. I was living out my fantasy of cutting up all of the mess in the backyard until the chain fell off. I haven't tried it since a friend managed to get the chain reattached, but he says it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Smarty Pants

customer_reviews.title: Get'er  Done without the Gas Hassle
customer_reviews.text: for the average home user all i can say is ditch the non-starting, fickle, aggravating, high maintenance, gas guzzling, oil burning, gas engine saws!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Nuss

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cut down a tree and it worked great. Plenty of power, didn't bog down too bad. Great saw for around the house. Base of the tree was about 20 inches and the 16 inch cut was fine bit I'd get bigger if I had more trees to cut.
customer_reviews.author: frank goeth

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me...enough power to cut the branches on my short palm tree, but easy enough for this Old Lady to handle. It doesn't come with oil, so if you plan to use it right out of the box be sure to order some or pick some up before the saw arrives.
customer_reviews.author: E LORRAINE

customer_reviews.title: A Cut Up
customer_reviews.text: Handy chain saw. No fuss start does a great job
customer_reviews.author: zakosdad

customer_reviews.title: Small chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: great for taking branches of trees as long they were small
customer_reviews.author: Alison M. Dierks

customer_reviews.title: Very good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, well built, cut through a 10" tree trunk like a hot knife through butter. Had to cut down that tree and chop it into pieces that the trash man would take away. Had no issues, no chain pop-offs, no oiler problems.
customer_reviews.author: NukerDoggie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I used this immediately after filling up the oil reservoir. It operated without problems. I was pleased with the performance and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well designed electric chain saw. Ready-to-go straight out of the box with high quality chain and solid components. Perfect for homeowner who wants to tackle medium size jobs. Used to saw up fallen trees after Irma. Also easy to clean with use of hand screw (green) to remove sprocket cover. Very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lion of Lion

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied.....
customer_reviews.text: The package is missing parts in my case it's the bar that holds the chain.....would not recomed this product...
customer_reviews.author: Henry G.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the earth oil
customer_reviews.text: Love the saw it's light weight easy to use cuts great
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Easy for woman to use.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. Easy for a woman to use, and powerful enough to cut small to medium size trees for firewood. LOVE this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product worked out exactly the way I had hoped. Well engineered and capable of getting the job done. Worked right out of the box. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: No gas, no starting issues. Same power as a gas powered. Love, love, love this chainsaw
customer_reviews.author: James B Cacio

customer_reviews.title: You dont get all the parts!
customer_reviews.text: Box looks like it went 10 rounds with Mike Tyson. Plus it was missing the bar. Kind of tough to cut with out one!
customer_reviews.author: michael meuleman

customer_reviews.title: this saw works great. im cutting 18 inch logs easily
customer_reviews.text: this saw works great.im cutting 18 inch logs easily...its not for hardcore everyday use but for what I'm doing its awesome
customer_reviews.author: rob nol

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived in a smashed box without any paperwork. Replacement arrived intact. Works great with plenty of power for 8" trunks. No auto-oiler issues. Perfect for home owner use if you have 120v available. Very happy with it - I like it better than my Stihl!
customer_reviews.author: vbalex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Electric chain saw!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding power for my needs, say up to 10 inch logs. Auto oiler worked fine, and it was easy to handle. No more yanking on pull ropes for m,e!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Howe

customer_reviews.title: works and cuts fine. bought two 12AWG 50 ft drag cords
customer_reviews.text: have used it about 4X so far. works and cuts fine. bought two 12AWG 50 ft drag cords, and it has worked just fine at this distance 100ft. will not go any further though
customer_reviews.author: Rita Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Love this chainsaw. Very easy to set up and light enough that I can cut everything in my yard effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Ready to go right out of the box. Just put in chain oil and plug in and your ready to go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacraku

customer_reviews.title: Ease
customer_reviews.text: For a electric chain saw it has been the best I have ever worked with. Easy to use, light, cuts great
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O. Mcclintock

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a dream. First experience with an ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a dream. First experience with an electric chainsaw for general yard mantainece. I should have bought one of these years ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was reasonably priced. Had no problems sawing large logs into smaller pieces. Dismantled as nice size fallen pine tree with ease. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice electric saw. I particularly like the tool-free chain adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: to assemble, to use, a bit shy on power but enough bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: nahum

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money....
customer_reviews.text: Great for homeowners with trees and overgrown brush. Effortless use and great results.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta J

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic. I used it to saw up a bunch ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. I used it to saw up a bunch of 4" trees and brush in my backyard and had no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dewing

customer_reviews.title: Chainsaw Unchained
customer_reviews.text: Works the way it should and is fast getting a job done.
customer_reviews.author: Briscoe County

customer_reviews.title: This is great for large limbs or small trees
customer_reviews.text: This is great for large limbs or small trees. I was pleasantly surprised at how well it works. My Dad was so impressed he ordered one for himself!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light-weight electric chain saw
customer_reviews.text: Excellent electric chain saw for smaller diameter trees and branches. Easy to use, to adjust chain slack, and to operate. Light weight makes it easier to maneuver and use for prolonged periods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It greatly exceeded my expectations. It's quiet and cuts ...
customer_reviews.text: It greatly exceeded my expectations. It's quiet and cuts very well. It has plenty of power. I've used it for pruning and taking a couple of birch trees down so far. The birches weren't large in diameter, about 6" to 8", but I would expect it to do as well with larger trees.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool at a great price to have if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels durable/solid. The product paid for itself after using it once given what it costs to get tree limbs trimmed. Wonderful tool at a great price to have if you have trees that need trimming every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Purchased It
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Lots of power. I actually like it better than my gas chainsaw. It ripped through green six inch branches like cutting butter.
customer_reviews.author: Arrowhuntr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little saw cuts like charm and so cheep Love ❤️ it
customer_reviews.author: William Stover

customer_reviews.title: Well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Saw is well-designed for easy use and adjustment and powerful enough to cut large trees.
customer_reviews.author: A. Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Great saw, I would buy it again if I needed one.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this saw got good reviews and after using it I see why. I used it to cut landscaping timbers and it is powerful and cuts great.
customer_reviews.author: Padroo

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: best cut for an electric chainsaw I have ever owned......absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect buying an electric chainsaw but I Couldn't be happier. This saw cut threw small trees and large bushes like butter. My yard looks great and I owe it all to this saw. It is the best purchase I have made on Amazon. A definite must buy!
customer_reviews.author: michael kilday

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This chain saw by far exceeded all of my expectations, I would recommend it to anyone, you won't be disappointmented
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice chain saw for light work
customer_reviews.text: i love it great value got my job done fast
customer_reviews.author: goley1234

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good to say about Earthwise products. Amazing power, and I've yet to kill one. (I killed 2 Remingtons) I really like the ease of chain adjustment. I'd match this thing against a gas saw anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Daniel Pinto

customer_reviews.title: ... only used it one time but it did a great job and was a lot better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it one time but it did a great job and was a lot better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that an electric wouldn't be strong enough but this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and value! This thing is a workhorse. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a power horse. I even cut a 8 inch tree down, no lag did not stall at all. It is so easy to use. I thought it would only cut little limbs. But it has amazed me
customer_reviews.author: Pennie Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Study little tool. Used it to trim branches touching my roof.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTINE

customer_reviews.title: The little chainsaw that can
customer_reviews.text: Love it ..great for getting rid of tree branches and bushes
customer_reviews.author: nandadevi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and, when routinely checked and adjusted, the chain stays tight.
customer_reviews.author: FireFoto

customer_reviews.title: did a great job on the trees 4- 8 inch thick i ...
customer_reviews.text: very surprised by the power, did a great job on the trees 4- 8 inch thick i recently cut down. no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: cutsyker

customer_reviews.title: No gas for me!
customer_reviews.text: Gas chainsaw quit! Just plug and go did everthing expected of it without the hassle of gas and pull starting
customer_reviews.author: Guthro

customer_reviews.title: Super Dooper! Easy to handle & I can finally ...
customer_reviews.text: Super Dooper! Easy to handle & I can finally get a close shave. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Missing part!!
customer_reviews.text: The blade the part the chain goes on was not in the box!
customer_reviews.author: steven n.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product is equal to or better than my gasoline chainsaw
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer sivadhcaeb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: first saw i ever own, it gets the job done. hassle free
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth wayne jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good basic electric chain saw, plenty of power for light to moderate jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Switzer

customer_reviews.title: this product may be useful as a hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: very disappointing performance - product was unable to cut through some basic urban shrubbery. this product may be useful as a hedge trimmer; should not be classified as a chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davis

customer_reviews.title: It was shipped on time in perfect condition it was not as powerful as we wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped on time in perfect condition it was not as powerful as we wanted so we returned it but only used it once
customer_reviews.author: gayle kahl

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Began making a really loud noise after 1st use. But did do the job. Basically it's a throw away item and cheaper than renting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: So far I like this product but I did not receive a owners ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product but I did not receive a owners manual with this electric chain saw. It would be nice to have an owners manual.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B. Watton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt use it on anything more than 1" thick.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. Took down a partially dead tree with ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Took down a partially dead tree with about a 10" circumference without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap chainsaw to cut a pine tree that fell in my backyard, this worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first couple of times and now it is having problems.

product_meta.title: Earthwise CS30116 16-Inch 12-Amp Corded Electric Chain Saw
product_meta.description:
Style:16-Inch, 12-Amp BlackEarthwise corded electric chain saw has a powerful 12 amp motor and reliable 16-Inch Oregon bar and chain. Perfect size for clearing brush, trimming trees or stockpiling firewood. Easy care with automatic oiling system and oil level window, takes bar and chain oil (not included). Easy chain tension adjustment-requires no tools. Includes bar and chain cover and a safety start button. No Gas. No fumes. Earthwwise is The Clean Air Choice.Tackle the tough jobs with the electric powered Earthwise Corded Chainsaw. The rubber over-molded handles provide a comfortable grip to this low kickback, 16-in. chainsaw. This is a low maintance and a high performance chainsaw.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Earthwise corded electric chain saw is easy to use with no mess, and it starts every time. It's the perfect size for clearing brush, trimming trees or stockpiling firewood. It features a 16" Oregon bar and chain with a tool-free chain adjustment. An automatic oiling system keeps the saw lubricated so you don't have to stop working. This chain saw also has an oil level window, rubber over molded handle and includes a bar and chain cover for safe storage. No gas needed so there are no fumes. Note: Chainsaw does not come with bar/chain oil, please fill oil reservoir with new bar and chain oil or SAE 30 weight motor oil. Earthwise is the Clean Air Choice!
feature_bullets: Plastic Bar and Chain Cover and Safety Button Feature
Tool-less Assembly - Fully Assembled in Package
